Message:
All who feign the virtuous hero
are powerless before my traps.

Just like that corrupt monk
from ages ago, everyone reveals
their true nature in disgrace.

To start things off, I tied his hair
with a ribbon as he slept.

Behold! This is the hidden power
of the infamous mononoke!

Now, become the laughingstock
of humans, and unleash
all the anger you like...

Wait, not even a flinch?!
Fine, so be it.
On to the next prank!

Heh-heh! As expected,
even that human was startled
by the trap this morning.

I made him burst in laughter as
he was consulting with his citizens.

The sight of him laughing
his head off upon seeing my face...
Heh-heh! ’Twas utterly disgraceful.

Oh, here he is,
appearing before me.

“Heh-heh! So you have
come seeking payback,
but that will not happen.
Tama the Glorious shall
deliver punishm...

Hm? Today’s prank caught you
a little off guard, you say?”

Not only are my traps ineffective,
he is actually enjoying them...

And, even I started having fun
somewhere along the way...

Hah... No wonder
he could break my seal.
He is proving to be quite
the formidable foe.
